mods.abstract: Felukas on the Nile in Egypt (ca. 1900); feluka without sails tied up at dock with four smaller boats (foreground); seven felukas with sail on the Nile (middle ground); opposite shore of Nile and mountain range (background); untitled print, "546" in pencil on back of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
